alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Pike; Posey; Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 12 at 3:06AM EST until January 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST /1 AM EST/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...All of western Kentucky, southwest Indiana and extreme southeast Illinois and extreme southeast Missouri. * WHEN...Through midnight CST /1 AM EST/ Friday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The chance for gusts up to 50 mph is high, and there is potential for gusts to 60 mph or greater. The effective impact of these high wind gusts cannot be overstated, especially as they occur over saturated grounds where trees will be more easily uprooted.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Gibson; Pike; Posey; Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick
